post:
[ZonedHost.com / ZonedHost.co.uk](http://www.zonedhost.com) - **Your Gateway to the World Wide Web**

**SPECIAL SPRING 2013 OFFER**
25% Off Any Orders At ZonedHost! Coupon: **25%offski**

**Why Us?**

We at ZonedHost are dedicated to providing the best services for the lowest cost. Our servers are co-located in Frankfurt, Germany on 100/1000MB connections with low pings for Europe. The servers themselves are AMD Quad Core CPU's (4x2.3Ghz) running on 16GB's worth of RAM. RAID1 is installed as standard on our servers so that your services remain online even during hardware failure! To make sure your services remain at their best, we offer 24/7 Support via several methods stated in the Support segments of our website. Better still, you have nothing to loose with ZonedHost with our "No Questions Asked; 30 Day Money Back Guarantee" (T&C May Apply). So become part of the Web's fastest growing hosting provider, ZonedHost today. 

**Ping Test, Speed Test & Uptime Stats**

Ping IP: zonedhost.redirectme.net (Dusseldorf, Germany)
Speed: [Download 10MB File To Test Speeds](http://zonedhost.com/10mb.bin)
